articles.title: Asian Games 2023 October 2 Live Updates: Double Bronze For India In Speed Skating Events - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 October 2 Live Updates: Indian athletes will be looking to add to their medals tally after a brilliant showing on Sunday.
articles.content:
Roller Skating Glory! #AsianGames2022
Our women's speed skating relay team has made their way to the 3000m Relay Final podium, claiming the BRONZE MEDAL!
With a stellar time of 4:34.861, they showc… [+137 chars]
